item.title: 马克龙希望管理欧洲的外交政策。并非所有人都同意
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙不需要发布自己殴打沙袋的图片，就能告诉全世界他准备好战斗了。【原文：Emmanuel Macron didn’t need to release images of himself walloping a punching bag to tell the world he was up for a fight.】

item.title: 中国人民银行行长寻求深化与亚洲经济体的货币关系
item.description: 中国人民银行行长潘功胜表示，中国将致力于加强与亚洲经济体的货币合作，以增强该地区的金融稳定性。【原文：People’s Bank of China Governor Pan Gongsheng said the country will aim to boost currency cooperation with Asian economies to enhance financial stability in the region.】

item.title: 香港市场萎靡不振，阿里巴巴再失大单
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. ）取消了其物流业务部门的上市计划，这使香港上市市场复苏的最后一大希望破灭，也给金融中心的领导者们带来了寻找新的复兴之路的压力。【原文：One of Hong Kong’s last big hopes for a resurgence of its IPO market has been dashed by Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s move to scrap a listing of its logistics unit, piling pressure on the financial hub’s leaders to find new paths to a revival.】

item.title: 新加坡顶级写字楼租金跃升至 2008 年以来最高点
item.description: 新加坡第一季度的写字楼租金创下了 15 年来的新高，一反困扰其他主要金融中心的商业地产不景气局面。【原文：Office rents in Singapore reached a 15-year high in the first quarter, defying the commercial property slump plaguing other major financial hubs.】

item.title: 金属反弹先于需求复苏，铝价下跌
item.description: 铝与其他工业金属一起下跌，原因是近期价格上涨遇到了最大消费国中国购买兴趣不足的问题。【原文：Aluminum fell with other industrial metals, as the recent rally in prices runs into a lack of buying interest in China, the top consuming country.】

item.title: 日元跌至 1990 年以来最低点
item.description: 日元兑美元汇率跌至约 34 年来的最弱水平，引发了人们对日本将加大力度减缓汇率下跌的猜测。【原文：The yen slid to weakest level in about 34 years against the dollar, fanning speculation that Japan will step up its effort to slow the decline.】

item.title: 干预在即，日元期权大额押注风险压垮交易者
item.description: 近 30 亿美元的美元-日元期权即将到期，这令交易员们惶惶不安，因为日本货币正徘徊在可能引发政府干预的水平边缘。【原文：The imminent expiry of nearly $3 billion in dollar-yen options has traders on edge as the Japanese currency teeters on the brink of levels that might trigger government intervention.】

item.title: 香港购房者避开二手房，涌向新项目
item.description: 政府上月减税后，香港购房者纷纷抢购新房。【原文：Hong Kong homebuyers are snapping up new properties after the government cut taxes last month.】

item.title: 中国经济企稳迹象表明工业利润上升
item.description: 今年前两个月，中国工业企业的利润有所增长，延续了自 8 月份以来的连增势头，为经济增添了积极的迹象。【原文：Profits at China’s industrial companies increased in the first two months of the year, extending a gaining streak since August and adding to positive signs in the economy.】

item.title: 中国 "非常接近 "终止对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收关税，商业领袖称
item.description: 一个商业游说团体表示，中国政府 "非常接近 "取消对澳大利亚葡萄酒进口征收的高额关税，同时也降低了对制裁取消后所有生产商重返市场的预期。【原文：The Chinese government is “very close” to lifting the heavy tariffs on Australian wine imports, a business lobby said, while tempering expectations about all producers returning to the market after the sanctions are lifted.】

item.title: 企业挫折加深，泰国股市外流加剧
item.description: 泰国的市场复兴不会到来。【原文：A market revival for Thailand just isn’t coming.】

item.title: 中国出人意料地修改每日定盘价，令人民币交易员无所适从
item.description: 交易员们试图驾驭中国外汇管理中最关键的部分，却发现视野越来越模糊。【原文：Traders seeking to navigate the most crucial part of China’s foreign-exchange management are finding visibility getting increasingly cloudy.】

item.title: 亿万富翁兄弟加入巴西肉类巨头 JBS 董事会
item.description: 巴西亿万富翁乔斯利-巴蒂斯塔（Joesley Batista）和韦斯利-巴蒂斯塔（Wesley Batista）兄弟被任命为 JBS SA 董事会成员，为他们在巨额腐败丑闻后阔别多年重返家族肉类帝国铺平了道路。【原文：Brazilian billionaire brothers Joesley and Wesley Batista were named to the board of JBS SA, paving the way for their return to the family’s meat empire after years of absence following a massive corruption scandal.】

item.title: 即使房贷利率高也不值得租住伦敦的房子
item.description: 在伦敦，拥有房产仍然比租房更划算，即使在抵押贷款利率上涨了一倍多之后也是如此，这反映出租房者为获得住房而必须支付的成本激增。【原文：Owning property in London remains better value than renting, even after mortgage rates more than doubled, reflecting a surge in the costs tenants must pay to secure a home.】

item.title: 爱尔兰国内经济强劲，ESRI 上调爱尔兰经济增长展望
item.description: 爱尔兰经济与社会研究所（Economic and Social Research Institute）表示，爱尔兰经济前景正在改善，这要归功于国内持续的抗通胀能力。【原文：Ireland’s economic outlook is improving thanks to continued resilience at home as inflation eases, the Economic and Social Research Institute said.】

item.title: 智利推出计划出租给私营公司的锂盐滩
item.description: 智利公布了将向锂矿开采开放的盐滩和将受到保护的其他盐滩，政府的目标是在未来十年内，通过新的公私合作模式，将电池金属的产量翻一番。【原文：Chile unveiled salt flats that will be opened up to lithium mining, and others that will be protected, as the government aims to double output of the battery metal over the next decade under a new public-private model.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好巴尔的摩主要桥梁坍塌，航运交通中断。阿里巴巴再次取消首次公开募股。"僵尸股 "卷土重来。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Major bridge in Baltimore collapses, halting shipping traffic. Alibaba calls off another IPO. The meme stock crowd makes a comeback. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 行业报告显示美国库存大幅增加，石油价格下跌
item.description: 在一份行业报告指出美国库存大幅增加之后，石油继续小幅下跌，而更广泛的市场在本季度结束前也呈现疲软态势。【原文：Oil extended a modest decline after an industry report pointed to a sizable build in US inventories, and wider markets struck a weaker tone ahead of the end of the quarter.】

item.title: S&P 公司称美国地区性银行面临商业地产挑战
item.description: S&P 全球评级公司周二表示，一些美国地区性贷款机构的资产质量和业绩可能会受到商业房地产市场压力的影响，该公司将五家贷款机构的评级展望从稳定下调至负面。【原文：Some US regional lenders could see their asset quality and performance hurt by the stresses in commercial real-estate markets, said S&P Global Ratings on Tuesday as it lowered its outlook on five lenders to negative from stable.】

item.title: 贸易摩擦加剧，青山集团计划在印尼建电池厂
item.description: 世界顶级镍生产商青山控股集团股份有限公司（Tsingshan Holding Group Co., Ltd.）旗下的电池部门计划在印尼建厂，这是中国一系列投资中的最新一笔，将帮助这个东南亚国家从商品生产逐步转向利润更丰厚的加工和制造业。【原文：The battery unit of Tsingshan Holding Group Co., the world’s top nickel producer, plans to build a plant in Indonesia, the latest in a series of Chinese investments that will help the Southeast Asian nation step up from commodities production to more lucrative processing and manufacturing.】

item.title: 美国股市下跌，亚洲股市开盘后走势低迷：市场综述
item.description: 在美国基准股指在最后半小时的交易中抹去涨幅之后，亚洲股市将以低调开盘，投资者将在今年已经突破4万亿美元的涨势之后重新平衡他们的投资组合。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set for a muted open after US benchmarks wiped out gains in the final half hour of trading, with investors rebalancing their portfolios after a rally that’s already topped $4 trillion this year.】

item.title: 加密货币矿工 Bitdeer 正在与私人信贷机构洽谈融资事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，加密货币矿商比特大陆科技集团（Bitdeer Technologies Group）正在与私人信贷公司谈判，以安排约 1 亿美元的融资。【原文：Crypto miner Bitdeer Technologies Group is in talks with private credit firms to arrange about $100 million in financing, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 法官裁定沃尔玛有权终止与 Capital One 的合作关系
item.description: 联邦法官裁定，沃尔玛公司有权终止与 Capital One Financial Corp. 的信用卡合作关系，零售商在试图结束与该银行合作关系的努力中取得了胜利。【原文：Walmart Inc. had the right to terminate a credit-card partnership with Capital One Financial Corp., a federal judge ruled, handing a victory to the retailer in its attempts to end its relationship with the bank.】

item.title: Marex 集团放弃在英国上市，申请在美国上市
item.description: Marex Group Plc 提交了首次公开募股申请，为英国在美国上市的公司增加了一个金融服务平台。【原文：Marex Group Plc filed for an initial public offering, adding the financial services platform to the UK-based firms going public in the US.】

item.title: Sal Mercogliano 谈巴尔的摩大桥垮塌事件
item.description:
一位航运专家谈到了另一场海难的影响。【原文：

A shipping expert speaks to the impact of another maritime disaster.

】

item.title: 加拿大监管机构称银行减少超长期抵押贷款
item.description: 据加拿大银行监管机构称，大流行病期间抵押贷款的迅速增加给金融系统带来了 "风险"，但加拿大贷款机构已开始控制超长住房贷款问题。【原文：The rapid run-up in mortgages during the pandemic represents a “pocket of risk” to the financial system but Canadian lenders are starting to get the problem of ultra-long home loans under control, according to the country’s bank watchdog.】

item.title: 美国批准后丹麦将向阿根廷出售战斗机
item.description: 在获得美国批准后，丹麦将向阿根廷出售 24 架 F-16 战机，预计耗资 21 亿克朗（约合 3 亿美元），这是南美国家在哈维尔-米莱伊总统领导下进行的首次大规模国防采购。【原文：Denmark will sell 24 of its F-16 warplanes to Argentina for an estimated cost of 2.1 billion kroner ($300 million) after receiving approval from the US in what is the South American nation’s first major defense purchase under President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 中国秘鲁港口的商业模式面临意外挑战
item.description: 中国斥资 13 亿美元在秘鲁建造的港口正面临着一场突如其来的挑战，可能会颠覆其商业模式，而此时距离今年晚些时候的开港仅有几个月的时间。【原文：China’s $1.3 billion port in Peru is facing a surprise challenge that could upend its business model, just months before its inauguration later this year.】

item.title: 面对高利率，散户投资者举办 "备忘录股票 "派对
item.description: 随着美联储发出令人鼓舞的信息、GameStop 公司的预期收益和高涨的股价点燃了日间交易者的亢奋情绪，零售投资人群又陷入了 "回忆股 "狂热的阵痛之中。【原文：The retail investing crowd is back in the throes of a meme stock mania as encouraging messaging from the Federal Reserve, GameStop Corp.’s expected earnings and sky-high stock prices ignite a euphoria among day traders.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会加强大规模黑客调查，重点关注科技和电信公司
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会正在询问科技和电信公司如何处理 2020 年 SolarWinds 的大规模网络攻击，网络安全行业和大企业纷纷指责该委员会越权。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission is asking tech and telecom companies how they handled the sprawling 2020 SolarWinds cyberattack, and drawing fire from the cybersecurity industry and big business for what they call overreach.】
